Hello pls seed this is a long ass dl !!

The Lost Chapters features all the content found in the original Fable, as well as additional new content such as new monsters, weapons, alignment based spells, items, armor, towns, buildings, and expressions, as well as the ability to give children objects. The story receives further augmentation in the form of nine new areas and sixteen additional quests. Characters such as Briar Rose and Scythe, who played only minor roles in the original game, are now given more importance and are included in certain main and side quests. Other character-based augmentations include the antagonist, Jack of Blades' voice sounding deeper, harsher and more demonic; or being able to uncover (and resolve) the murder mystery behind Lady Grey's sister.

Very fast download, simple to install. For all those having trouble, I cannot see why you are because when you take game torrents in general into consideration, it's actually one of the simplest I've some across. I use Windows 7, so the details may vary, but it's literally this easy:

Download and install PowerISO here: http://www.poweriso.com/download.htm

In the Fable file you have just downloaded, there are 4 .NRG files. Right-click the first, Fable (1o4), select "Open with," select "Choose default program..." and choose PowerISO from the directory into which you have installed it. This should bring up a separate PowerISO window in which you may view the files in Fable (1o4). Just exit the window.

Now, right-click the first NRG file again and there should now be an option (if there was not before) with an arrow beside it called "PowerISO." Hover the cursor over this to bring up a side menu, and select the third option on that menu, "Extract here using file names for folders." The PowerISO viewer should come up again. Answer in the affirmative to any questions it may ask. Wait for extraction. Exit PowerISO window again.

A file should now come up that shares the same title as the first NRG file, but is a folder. Now, right click the second NRG file and again choose PowerISO > Extract here using file names for folders. Do this again for the third and fourth NRG files.

Now, go into the "Fable (1o4)" FOLDER, find an application called "setup.exe" and open.

It asks for a CD key. I used this successfully: PXXQW 4PPBR KBD3F X33C3 YC34M. If not , try these: http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20080505133048AAGDvuY

Install.
